entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4 with risk of frost. POP 30%
